text: Gesner is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Abraham Pineo Gesner (1797–1864), Canadian physician and geologist *Alonzo Gesner (1842–1912), American politician and surveyor in Oregon *Conrad Gesner (1516–1565), Swiss naturalist, and botanical reference for Gesner *Johann Matthias Gesner (1691–1761), German classical scholar ==See also== *Gessner Category:German-language surnames
title: Gesner
